General.Name: Easy Field
General.Description: Easy Field Corporation researches, develops, manufactures, and sells industrial processing equipment and equipment components in Taiwan. The company offers automatic loder/unloder, edge clean, polarizer laminating, polarizer peel off, ACF bonding, COG bonding, FOG bonding, FOB bonding, back light module, dispenser, punch, optical bonding, optical vacuum bonding, and optical clear resin equipment for the optoelectronics industry. It also provides inner lead bonding, stiffener, COF punch, and wafer inspection equipment; and wafer warpage leveling and filter exchange devices, UV de-bonding machine, and auto packing products for the semiconductor industry. In addition, the company offers blister sealing, color lens, automatic optical inspection, and auto runner cutter machines; and production line of contact lens forming and assembling products for the health care industry. Further, it provides cover welding, semi auto helium inspection, cover plate assembly, rivet pressing, electrode welding, helium inspection, and inspection machines for the power battery industry. Additionally, the company offers integration services for smart factories. Easy Field Corporation was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 3-2, Ziqiang 4th Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 320
